price: আল্লাহৰ বাহিৰে আন কোনো সত্য ইলাহ নাই, তেৱেঁই মহা আৰছৰ প্ৰতিপালক।
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
